attributes.name: NodeModulesList
attributes.description: Class that stores information about a node_modules directory (i.e., the packages and subdirectories in the directory). It is one of the two types of entries in a PackageInfoCache. It is only created by the PackageInfoCache.

methods.description: Given error data, add an ErrorEntry to the ErrorList for this object.
methods.name: addError

params.name: errorData
params.description:
any error data relevant to the type of error
being created. See showErrors().

methods.description: Indicate if there are any errors in the NodeModulesList itself (not including errors within the individual entries).
methods.name: hasErrors

methods.description: Add an entry (PackageInfo or NodeModulesList instance) to the entries for this list. This is only called by PackageInfoCache. It is not intended to be called directly by anything else.
methods.name: addEntry

params.name: entryName
params.description:
the name of the entry, i.e., the name of the
file or subdirectory in the directory listing.

params.name: entryVal
params.description:
the PackageInfo or NodeModulesList tha corresponds
to the given entry name in the file system.

methods.description: Return a PackageInfo object for a given package name (which may include a scope)
methods.name: findPackage

params.name: packageName
params.description:
the name (possibly including a scope) of
   the PackageInfo the caller wants returned.

return.description: the desired PackageInfo if one exists for the given name, else null.
